src:
Live Streaming Arsenal vs Wolverhampton di Mola TV
02 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal dan Wolverhampton sama-sama tidak berjodoh dalam ajang Carabao Cup. Kedua tim pastinya ingin melampiaskan kekecewaan mereka pada ajang liga.
Peringkat 5 Arsenal akan menjamu peringkat 12 Wolverhampton di Emirates Stadium pada pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/20, Sabtu (02/11/2019).
Tengah pekan kemarin, Arsenal dikandaskan Liverpool di babak 16 besar Carabao Cup. Di Anfield, pasukan Unai Emery membuang keunggulan 3-1, 4-2, dan 5-4, sebelum bermain imbang 5-5, kemudian tersingkir lewat adu penalti.
Bagi Arsenal, yang pekan lalu juga gagal menang di Premier League, imbang 2-2 menjamu Crystal Palace, Wolverhampton wajib dikalahkan. Hanya saja, itu sepertinya tidak bakal mudah.
Sama seperti Arsenal, Wolverhampton juga baru tersingkir dari Carabao Cup. Mereka menyerah 1-2 di markas Aston Villa.
Pekan lalu, Wolverhampton juga gagal menang di Premier League. Mereka bermain imbang 1-1 di kandang Newcastle United.
Secara performa, kedua tim ini tak jauh beda. Di Emirates Stadium nanti, akankah salah satu dari mereka berhasil kembali ke trek kemenangan?
text:
The liquidator of the Chernobyl accident spoke about the danger of visiting the exclusion zone
02 Nov 2019, 20:57 by Alexey Gromov

One of the liquidators of the Chernobyl accident, Vyacheslav Grishin, condemned the opening of an exclusion zone for tourists. He said that the plutonium spots that are still there are still dangerous.

One of the liquidators of the accident at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant, chairman of the all-Russian organization “Union of Chernobyl” Vyacheslav Grishin condemned the opening of the exclusion zone for tourists. About it writes "360".
In his opinion, sending tourists to the exclusion zone without conducting research by independent international commissions is immoral and immoral, since there are still places where it is mortally dangerous for a person without special equipment. He also explained that so far no international organization has conducted research on the security of the zone, but tourist routes are already being prepared there.
According to Grishin, the main danger is plutonium spots, the half-life of which is about 30 thousand years, which means that now, when approaching them, getting serious radiation is quite real.
Grishin said that Kiev should not send money to develop tourism in the exclusion zone, but to people who took part in the liquidation of the accident and who needed medication and additional support.
In mid-September, a lecture by Dmitry Shamonov, a culturologist and specialist in the field of Western cultures, was held in St. Petersburg. He spoke about the Chernobyl disaster in the context of mass culture.
#USSR # accident # danger # experts # Chernobyl # nuclear power plant # liquidator
